name: Fly Sky High
description:
You are the pilot of a very agile plane and your task is to fly sky high! Admire the views on the helix-like environment that is constantly moving.

On your way up you will find obstacles and traps to avoid. Enemy planes are also there - don’t forget to bypass them!

You can collect power-ups on your way to the finish line: fly on speed up the ramp to activate speed mode – now you don’t have to worry about obstacles, you will crush them with your super speed!

Collect additional stars after crushing the obstacles into pieces. Activating the shield will also help you fly safely to the finish line. Try to collect as many stars as possible, the bigger the star, the more points it is worth.

On your way to the sky, you will discover different environments with unique sceneries. Collect diamonds and use them to unlock new airplanes.
